Name: SessionTimeout
Description: This setting controls the session timeout (in minutes) for all users.

Name: EnableMFA
Description: This setting controls whether Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) is enabled for all users or not. WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU DO NOT DISABLE MFA. LEGAL & COMPLIANCE REQUIREMENTS REQUIRE THE USE OF MFA TO PROTECT CUSTOMER DATA. IF YOU CHOOSE TO DISABLE THIS SETTING, YOU AGREE TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL THE LIABILITY ACCORDINGLY.

Name: MFATimeout
Description: This setting controls the amount of time (in days) after which a user will be re-prompted for MFA.

Name: ApprovedEmailDomains
Description: This setting controls which email address domains can be used for user's email addresses. This can be used an additional layer of security to prevent users from being added with an email address that is not in this approved list. Please enter each domain on it's own line.

Name: Logo
Description: This setting controls the logo that appears for your organization on the ODL portal.

Name: PIIDataRetentionThreshold
Description: This setting controls how long sensitive customer data fields (SSN, DOB, DL # etc.) are stored in KC.

Name: UnitTypes
Description: This setting controls which unit types appear for your organization on the ODL Portal.

Name: InterestRate
Description: This setting controls the default interest rate when new deals are created.

Name: DaysToFirstPayment
Description: This setting controls the default days to first payment when new deals are created.

Name: Term
Description: This setting controls the default term when new deals are created.

Name: TermFrequency
Description: This setting controls the default term frequency when new deals are created.

Name: DefaultUnitType
Description: This setting controls the default unit type for unit when new deals are created or updated.

Name: Default Deposit Type
Description: This setting controls the default deposit type in quotes/deals.

Name: LinkExpiration
Description: This setting controls the time interval after which the quote link sent to the Customer expires in hours.

Name: LinkExpiration
Description: This setting controls the time interval after which the credit application link sent to the Customer expires in hours.

Name: LenderList
Description: This setting controls the names of the lenders that will appear in the disclosures on the credit application to whom the application could be submitted to.

Name: AllowedDomains
Description: This setting controls the domains that are allowed to iframe the credit application.

Name: PrivacyPolicy
Description: This setting controls the link to the Privacy Policy that appears on the credit application.

Name: TermsOfUse
Description: This setting controls the link to the Terms of Use that appears on the credit application.

Name: DefaultCreditBureau
Description: This setting controls the default credit bureau report retrieved for your customers.

Name: AutoPullCreditReport
Description: This setting controls whether the system automatically attempts to retrieve a credit report when a credit app is submitted.

Name: EnablePreQualify
Description: This settings controls whether the pre-qualify soft pull disclosure appears on the Lead forms.

Name: AutoPullPreQualifyReport
Description: This setting controls whether a pre-qualify report is automatically retrieved if consent is received from the customer on the Lead forms.

Name: CaptureInsuranceInfo
Description: This setting controls whether the credit application form should have optional fields for insurance information.

Name: NumberOfReferences
Description: This setting controls the number of references to capture on the credit application.

Name: RequireReferences
Description: This setting controls whether the number of references specified above are required to submit the credit application. If unchecked, the reference fields will still appear based on the # of references configured above, but they will be optional.

Name: LightspeedIntegrationType
Description: This setting controls whether the FULL or LIGHT (open deals only) integration is enabled. This setting impacts integration costs and fees.

Name: LightspeedBulkImportPeriod
Description: This setting controls the number of days back worth of data that should be bulk imported.

Name: LightspeedBulkImportTTL
Description: This setting controls the number of days we will retain the records since they were last modified.

Name: LightspeedStoreName
Description: This setting controls which store customers get imported for when a dealer has multiple locations.

Name: lightspeed-EnableLeadSync
Description: This setting controls whether leads in Lightspeed are synced with KC.

Name: LightspeedUnitTypeMappings
Description: This setting controls how unit types are mapped from Lightspeed DMS.

Name: LightspeedProductMappings
Description: This setting controls the mapping of products sent to Lightspeed.

Name: dp360-EnableLeadSync
Description: This setting controls whether leads in DP360 are synced with KC.

Name: ShowProductCost
Description: This setting controls whether the retail customer price of the product shows for each product on the menu when expanded to see the product details.

Name: ShowPayments
Description: This setting controls whether the payment shows for each product on the menu when expanded to see the product details. NOTE: this only applies to finance deals.

Name: MenuAcceptanceEmail
Description: This setting controls whether a confirmation email is sent to the customer once the menu acceptance process is complete.

Name: MenuColumns
Description: This setting controls the configuration of the columns on the menu.

Name: ItemizePurchasePrice
Description: This setting controls whether the purchase price is itemized or not on the menu presentation and confirmation screens.

Name: FeesConfiguration
Description: This setting controls the configuration of fees.

Name: TaxProfileConfig
Description: This setting contains the tax profile configuration for the org.

Name: OrgNotificationsConfig
Description: This setting contains the notifications configuration for the org.

Name: PENDealerId
Description: This setting contains the org's DealerId for PEN.

Name: CheckListConfig
Description: This setting contains the checklist configuration for the org.

Name: CheckListForm
Description: This setting contains the checklist form for the org.

Name: MenuColumnConfig
Description: This setting controls the configuration of the columns on the menu.
